text: Oh, sorry, could you please repeat that...!
No, let's take a break for now.
...Seems like you were tensing your shoulders too much.

I'm sorry...
I know it myself, but...

Could it be...
about the other unit members?

...Yes.
As idols of 283Pro, I can't afford to fall behind.

It's good to have a competitive spirit,
but... the training camp isn't about competing.
You don't need to be overly conscious of the other units.

...Indeed, if I'm too focused on everyone else,
I won't be able to concentrate on my lessons.

(Even so, I understand how it feels to
keep worrying about everyone else.)

(If only there was something that could help
relieve the tension in Hiori's shoulders...)
